product_name: Koleston Perfect ME+ Permanent Color Collection
description:
Koleston Perfect - Our purest Color Ever with ME+ Technology
Hair color trends are constantly moving. One week we might be talking about rose gold hair, and the next we’re taking it neon blue or paring locks back with natural-looking balayage. You could never call our industry’s goings-on uneventful, but there is one area where things tend to stay the same: in the choice of dye molecules that are used.
Until now, that is. Wella Professionals’ technical advancement soars to new heights with the introduction of KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+. It is the first and only professional hair color brand to feature breakthrough technologies, Pure Balance Technology and ME+. But, what does that mean? Let’s break it down…

The Pure Balance Technology is designed to minimize the formation of free radicals during the color formation by deactivating impurities like metals present in hair. Free radicals interfere with the color formation during the color development and are a key cause to hair damage. With Pure Balance Technology, the result is even pure color results with natural depth and shine and significantly less hair damage, color after color*.

Meanwhile, the ME+ technology is a scientific breakthrough designed to replace extreme sensitizers, PPD and PTD. ME+ considerably reduces the risk of developing a new allergy to hair color**. First patented in the 19th century, PPD and PTD had been the leading ingredients in permanent hair color for over 130 years. NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ is about to change that, offering salon clients our most meaningful change in hair color innovation in over a century.
The new formula also delivers color that is significantly more even, balanced and true to tone from root to tip** offering better balance of tone and control of depth** with up to 100% grey coverage. The vibrant color portfolio spans naturals, brunettes, reds and blondes, plus a special mixing range to make a wide array of shades possible.
NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ features the same mixing ratio, the same development time and the same grey coverage, all enhanced with easier mixing, more precise application and an improved fragrance that offers a better experience for colorists and clients.
* Versus previous Koleston Perfect. Valid for Koleston Perfect with Pure Balance Technology

** FOR THE PEOPLE NOT ALLERGIC TO HAIR COLORANTS. Although the risk of developing new allergy is reduced, there remains a risk of allergic reaction that can be severe. Always perform an Allergy Alert Test 48h before each coloration. Strictly follow safety instructions and consult www.wella.com/XYZ. If your client has ever experienced an allergic reaction to hair colorants, you should not color. ME+ is present in specific shades of Pure Naturals, Rich Naturals, Vibrant Reds, Special Blondes and Deep Browns of the Koleston Perfect brand.

COLOR TOUCH opens up a world of fashion forward color for you and your clients. Experience the shine and vibrancy of a permanent color with the low commitment of a demi-permanent color. Last up to 24 shampoos and supplies high shine for stunning high fashion results.

VERO K-PAK? Color Intensity Shades: Joico Vero K-PAK Color Intensity Color System gives haircolor pros the power to create vivid, on-trend, insanely intense shades. This intermixable palette of semi-permanents includes the three new shades—Red, Yellow and Orange—plus supporting shades of Blue, Magenta, Purple, Green, along with a Clear Mixer, so that it's possible to create any hue, shade and nuance.

Designed to delight the artist that lives within every salon pro, Color Intensity can be applied straight from the tube, or combined in endless combinations. Each hue can be used with or without the Clear Mixer, for a range of intensities from extreme to moderate to less intense. Ideally applied to pre-lightened hair, results from these highly-pigmentized semi-permanents can last up to 8 shampoos, depending on hair's condition and porosity. And like all Joico Vero K-PAK Color, Color Intensity reconstructs as it colors, thanks to Joico's exclusive Quadramine Complex. Hair emerges shiny, healthy and manageable.

Matrix permanent and demi-permanent oxidative dyes are perfectly matched—so you can achieve seamless, scalp-to-ends color, that lasts and fades on tone.
  • Pre-Bonded: Matrix exclusive Bond-Protecting Concentrate protects the inner hair structure – so you can maintain the integrity of the hair, color after color.
  • Pre-Blended: Matrix formulas are pre-blended with background + reflect – so you can neutralize every underlying pigment.
  • Pre-Paired: Permanent + demi-permanent oxidative dyes are perfectly matched – so you can achieve seamless, root-to-tip color, that lasts and fades on tone.
Blended Collection pre-blended with brown/tan background. Formulated for natural and fashion tones on <50% gray.

LumiShine transforms hair from the inside out with breakthrough ArgiPlex Technology, delivering astonishing shine, color longevity, and overall healthier-looking hair?guaranteed!

Delivers up to 2X the shine*
Reduced breakage** and 100% replenished and restrengthened hair***
Nourishing protection that seals in moisture, softness, and shine for up to 30 shampoos****

* vs. untreated damaged hair
** Combing breakage on damaged hair with K-PAK. Color Therapy? Shampoo and Conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo
*** vs. haircolor without ArgiPlex
**** When followed with K-PAK. Color Therapy? Shampoo and Conditioner

LumiShine offers pros the easiest possible color solution for every salon service and hair type imaginable. Here?s why you?ll love LumiShine?
IT?S EASY! Three simple steps to brilliant color?consultation, formulation, and application. ITS PREDICTABLE... RELIABLE... AND UTTERLY STRAIGHTFORWARD! A full spectrum of perfectly balanced, intermixable pre-blended shades allows you to deliver straight-from-the-tube (or bottle) color perfection?every single time. IT SMELLS AMAZING! LumiShine is formulated with Joico?s exclusive Gentle Fresh Fragrance technology, a patented combination of molecules that helps neutralize airborne ammonia and envelopes your color service in fresh, calming notes of bergamot, iris, and sandalwood. Client comfort is off the charts. Awards

AWARDS

BEHINDTHECHAIR.COM
Stylist Choice Awards 2016 winner for Favorite New Color Line

BEAUTY LAUNCHPAD MAGAZINE
Readers Choice Awards 2018 winner for Best Fashion Color

description:

Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme is a gentle, ammonia-free, deposit-only color that's available in 40 shades with a level system ranging from 1 to 10. It's specially formulated for consistent, reliable results when used with Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme Activator 9 Volume.

To ensure straightforward and easy-to-use hair color for stylists, Kenra Color™ offers:

product_name: Poolside Light Blue Semi-Permanent Hair Color
description:
Pastel blue is just one of those semis colors that causes problems for artists constantly. It just seems like no matter how light you get the canvas, you’re still left with a hint of green from the slightest natural warmth - to the point that adding in a little canceling violet to a pastel blue application is a pretty common practice. Knowing this though, Danger Jones was determined to pack Poolside with enough pigment to fight the warmth, while still offering a pastel result. And when it came down to it, that became the brand's expectation for all of their pastels: to actually offer full coverage, without any spottiness or hollowness - a feat artists are raving about daily!

product_name: DIA Light Acidic Demi-Permanent Hair Color
description:
What It Is

DIA Light is an acidic demi-permanent gel-crème haircolor without ammonia used to gloss, tone, and refresh color. We recommend DIA Light be used after all lightening services.

What It Does

  • Tone, gloss, refresh previously colored or sensitized hair.
  • Gentle acid technology smooths the cuticle for vinyl shine.
  • Provides intense care for the hair.
  • Provides zero lift.
  • Not for white coverage - for white coverage of up to 70% white, we recommend DIA Richesse.

What Else You Need to Know

  • A Must Have: Milkshake Shades.
  • Cool shades in Level 9 and 10 are amazing to tone and gloss your blondes in just 2-10 minutes.
Developer Pro Tips:

You can use any DIActivateur Developer with DIA Light, but our Artists recommend:
  • 6-vol. DIActivateur Developer for your blondes.
  • 9-vol. DIActivateur Developer for your brunettes.
  • 15-vol DIActivateur Developer for your red heads & fashion shades.

The Color Accelerator (TCA) by Dennis Bernard fights fadeout! What could please your color clients more than a product that helps retain great color longer, while leaving them with silky strands? The TCA BY Dennis Bernard works to extend color life and prevent fadeout. Add this accelerator to professional hair color products, whether semi, demi, or permanent, and then use low heat processing. The product also can be added to bleach, foil and high-lift applications. Even feisty reds will fight fade thanks to the hair color additive. Tested by colorists in numerous salon settings, it works in just a few minutes. Add extra minutes to the salon timers to accelerate color on resistant hair, too. The TCA by Dennis Bernard accentuates perm processing, too. You can squeeze drops into perm neutralizers to silken hair as it adopts vibrant waves or curls.

If you have clients with damaged hair, the accelerator can amplify the effects of moisturizing conditioners, for that extra service any client will appreciate. Though highly effective, the formula is gentle and non-irritating. The Dennis Bernard Company invented TCA to speed up processing, with mega-conditioning, and practically eliminating fadeout. TCA gives color specialists a tool for improved bleaching and coloring services. Faster and more effective processing can actually benefit the bottom line of stylists who do a lot of coloring. When stylists can reduce color processing times with successful results, it opens up the potential for additional appointments and increased earnings.

If you have curly hair, you probably love a great styling product - or two, or three, or more. And, after awhile, those products can build up on your curls, along with residue from dirt, oil, and hard or chlorinated water. The result? Dull, droopy curls that can't live up to their full, springy, shiny potential. That's when curls need the help of a clarifying shampoo. Unlike other clarifiers that can be too harsh and drying, our Water Works Clarifying Shampoo is formulated to be curl-friendly. Its gentle but powerful chelating formula uses a blend of Lemon, Grapefruit, and Orange Flower extracts to target, break down, and remove residue build-up without stripping away essential moisture. In one wash, it will help to "reboot" the curl pattern for a fresh start. Plus, it's safe to use on color-treated hair (but shouldn't be used directly after a coloring process). Curls are left clean, completely nourished, and ready for styling.

BosVolumize Hair Thickening Fibers naturally bond to existing hair with keratin fibers that blend and cover thinning and low density areas.  Because our own hair is made of Keratin and naturally holds a positive charge, BosleyMD Hair Thickening Fibers are designed to mimic our own human hair but with a negative charge.
